basic_info.description: I am Irene Díaz, a software developer with experience in web application development. I love learning new technologies and working on challenging projects. I am always willing to learn and work as part of a team.

projects.title: The World of Animals
projects.description: This application helped me learn how to master React. It is adapted to all types of screens, and its basic functionality is a CRUD system.

projects.title: Serviboda
projects.description: Personal project for a subject on markup languages. I was responsible for creating a website for an event planning company, where I applied the knowledge I gained in CSS and HTML that year.

projects.title: Hyfe Films
projects.description: In one of the most recent projects I've worked on, the application is divided into two main profiles: admin and user. The admin profile allows content management, offering functions to add new films as well as edit or delete existing ones. On the other hand, the user profile, which is accessed via registration, allows users to explore films by categories and other criteria selected through buttons. It also includes a search feature to facilitate navigation and title searches. The entire project was developed using Svelte, a new language for me, which I had the opportunity to learn and apply in this project.
